title: Support for XGBoost 1.0.0
body:
This is maybe a bit early but XGBoost 1.0.0rc1 (see https://github.com/dmlc/xgboost/issues/5253) was just released and it seems that it breaks enough things so that it doesn't work when using `onnxmltools.convert.xgboost.operator_converters.XGBoost.convert_xgboost`.

This is what happens when using `convert_sklearn` on a pipeline containing an `XGBoostRegressor`:
```
 File "/home/victor/.cache/pypoetry/virtualenvs/env-51Be8MFl-py3.7/lib/python3.7/site-packages/skl2onnx/convert.py", line 138, in convert_sklearn
    dtype=dtype, options=options)
  File "/home/victor/.cache/pypoetry/virtualenvs/env-51Be8MFl-py3.7/lib/python3.7/site-packages/skl2onnx/common/_topology.py", line 963, in convert_topology
    conv(scope, operator, container)
  File "/home/victor/.cache/pypoetry/virtualenvs/env-51Be8MFl-py3.7/lib/python3.7/site-packages/onnxmltools/convert/xgboost/operator_converters/XGBoost.py", line 279, in convert_xgboost
    cls.convert(scope, operator, container)
  File "/home/victor/.cache/pypoetry/virtualenvs/env-51Be8MFl-py3.7/lib/python3.7/site-packages/onnxmltools/convert/xgboost/operator_converters/XGBoost.py", line 189, in convert
    name=scope.get_unique_operator_name('TreeEnsembleRegressor'), **attr_pairs)
  File "/home/victor/.cache/pypoetry/virtualenvs/env-51Be8MFl-py3.7/lib/python3.7/site-packages/skl2onnx/common/_container.py", line 383, in add_node
    "".format(op_type, name)) from e
ValueError: Unable to create node 'TreeEnsembleRegressor' with name='TreeEnsembleRegressor'.
```

For the record it works with XGBoost 0.90 and `convert_xgboost` is setup with `skl2onnx.update_registered_converter`.
